scripts.start:dev: npm run build:client && npm run start:server
scripts.build:client: cd vidyaai-ui && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: cd vidyaai-api && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:server: cd vidyaai-api && npm install && ts-node src/index.ts
scripts.bootstrap: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
